text.content: what even more unsettling than this castration alone is the one who did it. Hayley's character is played by Eliot Page (former known as Ellen Page when 'she' hadn't came out yet). this movie was released in 2006 so i will call 'her' Ellen Page. i like ellen bc she was lovely sweet adorable in every movie i watch staring her like kitty pryde in xmen. i was fooled by those traits in this one where her character's actions had nothing in common with the look at all.
